thread.title: BRIEF-Ibc Advanced Alloys Announces Short-Form Prospectus Offering Of Debenture Units And Convertible Debenture Units

title: BRIEF-Ibc Advanced Alloys Announces Short-Form Prospectus Offering Of Debenture Units And Convertible Debenture Units

organizations.name: debenture units and convertible debenture units reuters staff

text: 32 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Ibc Advanced Alloys Announces Short-Form Prospectus Offering Of Debenture Units And Convertible Debenture Units Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Ibc Advanced Alloys Corp: * IBC ADVANCED ALLOYS ANNOUNCES SHORT-FORM PROSPECTUS OFFERING OF DEBENTURE UNITS AND CONVERTIBLE DEBENTURE UNITS TO RAISE UP TO C$6 MILLION FOR PRODUCTION CAPACITY EXPANSION AND OTHER PURPOSES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
